definition: the elbow turns the wrong way/to favor an outsider instead of someone on one's own side (idiom)
pinyin: ge1 bo5 zhou3 chao2 wai4 guai3

sentences.english: It is impossible to lick your elbow.
sentences.chinese: 你不可能舔着自己的胳膊肘。

sentences.english: The two women leaned upon the wrought-iron window rail in the shadow of the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 兩個女人在窗簾的遮掩下，把胳膊肘支在鐵欄杆上。

sentences.english: My elbow banged against the door last week and it still hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我的胳膊肘在一個禮拜前撞在了門上，到現在還很疼。

sentences.english: Soapy's elbow was poling through his torn shirt sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 蘇比的胳膊肘從他襯衣的破袖子裏露了出來。

sentences.english: Our arms and legs bend at the joints—the elbows and knees.
sentences.chinese: 我們的胳膊和腿在關節處，即胳膊肘和膝蓋處彎曲。

sentences.english: He locks his elbow in mine.
Such as crawling down, support the body with his elbow alternately crawl as well.
sentences.chinese: 如往下爬行，用胳膊肘支撐身體交替着匍匐前進爲好。

sentences.english: Martin was up on one elbow, trying to plump his pillow.
sentences.chinese: 只見馬田拿一隻胳膊肘支起身，正要摔枕頭。

sentences.english: He leaned an elbow on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他用一個胳膊肘拄桌子。

sentences.english: Young Evanson of Forward Planning caught me a right zinger on the elbow, you know.
sentences.chinese: 前瞻計劃部的小埃文斯給我的胳膊肘來了一槍。

sentences.english: He was elbowed in the face, trying to get the rebound.
sentences.chinese: 在搶籃板球時，他被胳膊肘撞到了臉。

sentences.english: He raised himself on one elbow and looked at the bedside clock.
sentences.chinese: 他用一隻胳膊肘撐起來看了看牀邊的鐘。

sentences.english: I paused again and this time I made bold to seize Fortunato by an arm above the elbow.
sentences.chinese: 我又一次停下來，我貿然抓住了弗圖拉多的胳膊肘。

sentences.english: He poked me in the ribs with his elbow.
sentences.chinese: 他用胳膊肘捅了捅我的肋部。

sentences.english: He took his elbows off the desk and showed his boss the design.
sentences.chinese: 他將胳膊肘從桌上移開，向老闆展示設計。

sentences.english: It is impossible for most people to lick their own elbow.
sentences.chinese: 大部分人舔不到自己的胳膊肘。

definition: armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
